author: schor
msg: [UIMA-1119] improve error message for xmi deserialization.  Applied Burn's patch, but changed the new message to indicate it is coming from xmi deserialization.  Didn't change the other messages, which still say XCAS, (which is wrong if they are issued by the xmi deserializer), in case other (test?) code might depend on these messages.

author: ppoddar
msg: OPENJPA-766: Allow Tests that fail to be included in the repository. Annotate the TestCase or its specific methods with @AllowFailure(true|false)

author: dkulp
msg: If using jms102, use the correct factory.
Make the default for CXF 2.2 be to use the JMS 1.1 stuff (CXF 2.1.x/2.0.x will default to 1.0.2)
